about_the_game:
Lightwave is a platformer project gone full indie. Inspired by classic platformers and modern indie titles alike, this 2D pixel platformer features highspeed, fluid movement.

  • Follow up the basics of platforming with advanced tech as you jump, slide and dash your way across the different Grids and overcome various obstacles.

  • Unlock the RGBeam to unlock your true speed potential.

  • Race your friends across the Grid with 4 player split-screen.

  • Enjoy an original chiptune soundtrack full up upbeat music to race to.

  • Try out the LightWave demo to see if its the kind of indie game you would want to support. The game is growing and you can be a part of that!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers
